means: 通过设定一时间期限来统治

sentence.Network_en: One month before the deadline we see the hollowness of these promises.
sentence.Network_cn: 离最后期限只有一个月时，我们认识到了这些许诺都是空头支票。

sentence.Network_en: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。

sentence.Network_en: We were still right on target for our deadline.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们仍然有可能赶在最后期限前达成目标。

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲：Deadline 作曲：张敬轩 填词：黄伟文 编曲：Johnny Yim 监制：张敬轩 Johnny Yim 演唱：张敬轩 所属专辑：《Why Not》 歌曲介绍 张敬轩在最新粤语大碟《Why Not》中再度展示创作才华，包办了专辑全部歌曲，首支打榜歌曲《Deadline》在劲歌王榜上勇夺冠军。《Deadline》的灵感就来源于张敬轩向来有写遗嘱的习惯，一举夺得2010年度香港十大中文金曲的奖项。这首歌的曲风为R&B，并且收录于诺基亚N8手机中，使人听

entry.def: A deadline is a time or date before which a particular task must be finished or a particular thing must be done.

example.ex: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays...
example.tran: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。

example.ex: The deadline for submissions to the competition will be Easter 1994...
example.tran: 递交参赛申请的截止时间为 1994 年的复活节。

means.word_mean: 1. the point in time at which something must be completed

auth_sentence.content: Now, the deadline has been extended until Saturday.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, the deadline has been extended until Saturday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, the deadline has been extended until Saturday.

auth_sentence.content: We're just five years away from the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're just five years away from the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're just five years away from the deadline.

auth_sentence.content: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dea死,消亡+ed表形容词→adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者
dead[adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者]+ly表形容词[放在名词后]或副词[形容词后]→adj.致命的,致死的 adv.非常地,如死一般地
dead[adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者]+ly表形容词[放在名词后]或副词[形容词后]→adj.致命的,致死的 adv.非常地,如死一般地
dea死,消亡+ed表形容词→adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者
dead死亡的+line线→死亡线→不能过的线→最后期限
dea死,消亡+th表名词→ n. 死亡;灭亡,毁灭

Sentence.sentence: He cannot finish his assignment before the deadline.
I don't want to miss the deadline.
The recent trend toward early decision and early action among selective colleges and universities has pushed the traditional deadline of January up to Nov
One recent change in college admissions is that selective colleges and universities have moved the traditional deadline to earlier dates.

sentences.en: Next week is the deadline for sending in your application.
sentences.cn: 呈递申请书的截止日期是下星期。

sentences.en: I want the report ready for the three o'clock deadline.
sentences.cn: 我希望报告最迟在三点之前准备好。

sentences.en: We're working to a tight deadline.
April 15 is the deadline for filling individual income-tax returns.
sentences.cn: 个人所得税申报归档的最后期限是4月15日。

jushi.english: They've given us a five o'clock deadline.
jushi.chinese: 他们给我们规定的最后期限是5点钟。

jushi.english: Ministers set a deadline of 5 April for Serbia to accept the peace plan.
jushi.chinese: 部长们规定4月5日为塞尔维亚接受和平计划的最后期限。

jushi.english: The deadline for applications was last Friday.
jushi.chinese: 申请的最后期限是上星期五。
